title: The Basel Committee gives priority to risk-weighted assets in the final phase of the Basel ...
text: ( Source : Sveriges Riksbank ) Date12/10/ 2015 Much of the work on Basel III has been completed, although outstanding regulations still need to be finalised. The various regulations must also be calibrated and analysed together in order to gain
